title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 395/96 of 4 March 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1667/95 establishing a forecast balance for the supply to the Canary Islands of live bovine animals and beef and veal products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 395/96 of 4 March 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1667/95 establishing a forecast balance for the supply to the Canary Islands of live bovine animals and beef and veal products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EC) No 1667/95 is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 March 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 260, 31. 10. 1995, p. 10.
(3) OJ No L 296, 17. 11. 1994, p. 23.
(4) OJ No L 304, 29. 11. 1994, p. 18.
(5) OJ No L 158, 8. 7. 1995, p. 26.
ANNEX
FORECAST SUPPLY BALANCE FOR LIVE BOVINE ANIMALS AND BEEF AND VEAL FOR THE CANARY ISLANDS FOR THE PERIOD 1 JULY 1995 TO 30 JUNE 1996
>TABLE>
